verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> I have made <S%H5414><s%> thee a god <S%H430><s%> to Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thy prophet. <S%H5030><s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> thee: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> that he send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of his land. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%>

And I <S%H589><s%> will harden <S%H7185><s%> <S%H853><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H853><s%> my signs <S%H226><s%> and my wonders <S%H4159><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

But Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, that I may lay <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine armies, <S%H6635><s%> and <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by great <S%H1419><s%> judgments. <S%H8201><s%>

And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I stretch forth <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and bring out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> them.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> they.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> when they spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> Show <S%H5414><s%> a miracle <S%H4159><s%> for you: then thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy rod, <S%H4294><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and it shall become <S%H1961><s%> a serpent. <S%H8577><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and they did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded: <S%H6680><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> cast down <S%H7993><s%> <S%H853><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and it became <S%H1961><s%> a serpent. <S%H8577><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the wise men <S%H2450><s%> and the sorcerers: <S%H3784><s%> now the magicians <S%H2748><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> in like manner <S%H3651><s%> with their enchantments. <S%H3858><s%>

For they cast down <S%H7993><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his rod, <S%H4294><s%> and they became <S%H1961><s%> serpents: <S%H8577><s%> but Aaron's <S%H175><s%> rod <S%H4294><s%> swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> <S%H853><s%> their rods. <S%H4294><s%>

And he hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> that he hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them; as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> is hardened, <S%H3515><s%> he refuseth <S%H3985><s%> to let the people <S%H5971><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

Get <S%H1980><s%> thee unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> he goeth out <S%H3318><s%> unto the water; <S%H4325><s%> and thou shalt stand <S%H5324><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the river's <S%H2975><s%> brink <S%H8193><s%> against he come; <S%H7125><s%> and the rod <S%H4294><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was turned <S%H2015><s%> to a serpent <S%H5175><s%> shalt thou take <S%H3947><s%> in thine hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto <S%H413><s%> thee, saying, <S%H559><s%> Let <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> hitherto <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3541><s%> thou wouldest not <S%H3808><s%> hear. <S%H8085><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> In this <S%H2063><s%> thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> with the rod <S%H4294><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in the river, <S%H2975><s%> and they shall be turned <S%H2015><s%> to blood. <S%H1818><s%>

And the fish <S%H1710><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the river <S%H2975><s%> shall die, <S%H4191><s%> and the river <S%H2975><s%> shall stink; <S%H887><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall loathe <S%H3811><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the river. <S%H2975><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> thy rod, <S%H4294><s%> and stretch out <S%H5186><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> their streams, <S%H5104><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> their rivers, <S%H2975><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> their ponds, <S%H98><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their pools <S%H4723><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> that they may become <S%H1961><s%> blood; <S%H1818><s%> and that there may be <S%H1961><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both in vessels of wood, <S%H6086><s%> and in vessels of stone. <S%H68><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded; <S%H6680><s%> and he lifted up <S%H7311><s%> the rod, <S%H4294><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were in the river, <S%H2975><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of his servants; <S%H5650><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were in the river <S%H2975><s%> were turned <S%H2015><s%> to blood. <S%H1818><s%>

And the fish <S%H1710><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in the river <S%H2975><s%> died; <S%H4191><s%> and the river <S%H2975><s%> stank, <S%H887><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the river; <S%H2975><s%> and there was <S%H1961><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> with their enchantments: <S%H3909><s%> and Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did he hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them; as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did he set <S%H7896><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> to this <S%H2063><s%> also. <S%H1571><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> digged <S%H2658><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the river <S%H2975><s%> for water <S%H4325><s%> to drink; <S%H8354><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4325><s%> of the river. <S%H2975><s%>
And seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> were fulfilled, <S%H4390><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the river. <S%H2975><s%>
